trans-unit.source: Indicates the system's power status.
trans-unit.target: Angir systemets power status.

trans-unit.source: PowerBroadcastStatus is used by the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase> class to indicate a change in the system's power status.
trans-unit.target: PowerBroadcastStatus brukes av den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase>klassen for å angi en endring i systemets power status.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase>

trans-unit.source: You can design your application to react to any power status change.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utforme programmet til å reagere endringer power status.

trans-unit.source: Battery power is low.
trans-unit.target: Det er lite batteristrøm.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: An Advanced Power Management (APM) BIOS signaled an APM OEM event.
trans-unit.target: Avanserte Power Management () FALL signalisert en APM OEM-hendelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: A change in the power status of the computer is detected, such as a switch from battery power to A/C.
trans-unit.target: En endring i power statusen for datamaskinen registreres, for eksempel bytting fra batteristrøm til a/c.

trans-unit.source: The system also broadcasts this event when remaining battery power slips below the threshold specified by the user or if the battery power changes by a specified percentage.
trans-unit.target: Systemet kringkaster også denne hendelsen når gjenværende batteristrøm forsinket under terskelverdien som er angitt av brukeren, eller hvis batterispenningen endres ved en angitt prosentdel.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The system has requested permission to suspend the computer.
trans-unit.target: Systemet har bedt om å avbryte datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: An application that grants permission should carry out preparations for the suspension before returning.
trans-unit.target: Et program som gir tillatelse skal utføre forberedelser for deaktiveringen før den returnerer.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The system was denied permission to suspend the computer.
trans-unit.target: Systemet ble nektet tilgang til å stoppe datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: This status is broadcast if any application or driver denied a previous <xref uid="langword_csharp_QuerySuspend" name="QuerySuspend" href=""></xref> status.
trans-unit.target: Denne statusen sendes hvis alle programmer eller driveren nektet et tidligere <xref uid="langword_csharp_QuerySuspend" name="QuerySuspend" href=""> </xref> status.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The computer has woken up automatically to handle an event.
trans-unit.target: Datamaskinen har woken automatisk for å behandle en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The system has resumed operation after a critical suspension caused by a failing battery.
trans-unit.target: Systemet har gjenopptatt operasjonen etter en kritisk utestengelse skyldes et batteri mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The system has resumed operation after being suspended.
trans-unit.target: Systemet har gjenopptatt operasjonen etter blir deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The computer is about to enter a suspended state.
trans-unit.target: Datamaskinen er i ferd med å angi en deaktivert tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This event is typically broadcast when all applications and installable drivers have returned <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to a previous <xref uid="langword_csharp_QuerySuspend" name="QuerySuspend" href=""></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen sendes vanligvis når alle programmer og installeres drivere har returnert <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> til en tidligere <xref uid="langword_csharp_QuerySuspend" name="QuerySuspend" href=""> </xref> tilstand.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
